channel.title: unity on un01s notes
channel.description: Recent content in unity on un01s notes

item.title: unity and others
item.description: Unity claimed that 70% of the top 1000 mobile game developers chose it. Its new policy of installation fee attracts a lot of critism and anger, from indie developers in particular. However, the cause of this is due to the market changes: the market of mobile game has its first decline after 7 years’ expansion. the population of mobile game stops to increase. the growth hey-day of mobile game is over.
